content.rendered:
Fall Season Start Dates:  
Specific tryout dates, times and location will be posted on the athletics website in August.
  • Monday, August 19: Varsity/JV Football 
  • Monday, August 26: All other Varsity/JV/Freshman Sports
  • Thursday, August 29: 7th and 8th Football      
  • Tuesday, September 3: All other Modified Sports Start
APP Information
Athletic Placement Process Information 
  • Friday, August 16 from 9:00am- 10:00am
  • Monday, August 19  from 5:00pm-6:00 pm
  • Tuesday, August 20 from 5:00pm-6:00pm  

Athletics Registration Dates

  • Sunday, July 28, 2024,  Family ID/Arbiter will open for medical clearance for Varsity, Junior varsity, and Freshman level sports  
  • Monday, August 5, 2024, Family ID/Arbiter will open for medical clearance for Modified sports including modified 7/8 and mod 9  

Physical Information:

Physicals expire 12 months after the date of the health exam. No athlete will be permitted to play or tryout with an expired physical.  
Physicals will be offered at the High School Nurse’s Office on 8/15 and 8/16 from 8:00am – 10:00am. Please reach out to the nurse at hs_healthoffice@saratogaschools.org to see if your child needs a physical. Click here for a link to the Health Examination Form.

 

Winter Start Dates:

  • Monday, November 18th – All High School Sports
  • Monday, November 25th – All Modified Sports (Mod 9, 7th or 8th grade)
  • Monday, October 21 – Family ID/Arbiter will open for medical clearance for Varsity, Junior varsity, and Freshman level sports
  • Monday, Oct 28th – Family ID/Arbiter will open for medical clearance for Modified sports including modified 7/8 and mod 9

Spring Start Dates:

  • Monday, March 17th – All High School Sports
  • Monday, March 31st – All Modified Sports (Mod 9, 7th or 8th grade)
  • Monday, Feb. 17th – Family ID/Arbiter will open for medical clearance for Varsity, Junior varsity, and Freshman level sports
  • Monday, March 3rd – Family ID/Arbiter will open for medical clearance for Modified sports including modified 7/8 and mod 9
